page.title: 03HOUSING IN NORTH TYNEDALE
page.content: Fell End Ref. 8481 facing up the valley on the B6320 is a typical one storied{stone built cottage}with added lounge sunporch. Fell View 8481 is a 1983 timber framed 3 bedroomed bungalow on edge of moors, view to Bellingham and North Tyne valley. Whitewall Nook 8581 adjacent to B6320, an original one storey stone cottage extended in 1970. Reedsmouth Hall 8681 an attractive stone{country house}with gardens sloping south to the North Tyne river. There is a small self contained cottage adjacent to house.Station House a converted{signal {box}now a private home situated on old rail track. Buteland 8781 Old stone {farmhouse}stands 700ft above sea level, with all round view north to Cheviot and south to Cross Fell. Workers cottage adjoins. Ealingham 8480 a double fronted farmhouse.
